DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study is to examine the atherosclerotic plaque stability using in vivo and in vitro techniques and to investigate the influence of exercise, anti-diabetic, lipid-lowering and cannabinoids receptor antagonists on atherosclerotic plaque texture in patients with cardiovascular risk and animals prone to atherosclerosis.
DOC.brief_title: Diagnosis and Therapy of Vulnerable Atherosclerotic Plaque
DOC.criteria: Carotid atherosclerosis Femoral atherosclerosis Cardiovascular risk Heart failure Renal disease Liver disease Lifethreatening diseases
